sentences.sContent: He has been unjustly dispossessed of his country.
sentences.sContent_eng: He has been unjustly dispossessed of his country.

sentences.sContent: When the most dispossessed person in the poorest neighborhood receives the same treatment as the rich man living high upon the hill, civil society is strengthened and the police are ennobled.
sentences.sContent_eng: When the most dispossessed person in the poorest neighborhood receives the same treatment as the rich man living high upon the hill, civil society is strengthened and the police are ennobled.
sentences.sCn: 当最贫困社区中的最无依无靠的人得到与在山坡豪宅中的富人同样的对待时，公民社会得到加强，警察的工作受到尊敬。

synos.tran: 被逐出的；无依无靠的；失去产业的

trans.tranCn: 无依无靠的, 被逐出的
